abstract: American Electric Power, one of the nation’s largest utilities, is expected to announced an agreement to settle a long-running lawsuit over emissions from its coal-fired power plants.
snippet: American Electric Power, one of the nation’s largest utilities, is expected to announced an agreement to settle a long-running lawsuit over emissions from its coal-fired power plants.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 8 — American Electric Power, one of the nation’s largest utilities, is expected to announced that it has reached an agreement to settle a long-running lawsuit over emissions from its coal-fired power plants.

headline.main: Big Utility Says It Will Settle 8-Year-Old Pollution Suit
headline.print_headline: Big Utility Says It Will Settle 8-Year-Old Pollution Suit

byline.original: By Matthew L. Wald and Stephanie Saul
